languages.text: "А ты не находишь странным, что у тебя голова вечно в собственной заднице, Хротко? Очевидно же, что ее кто-то подставил!"
"And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"
languages.original_text: "А ты не находишь странным, что у тебя голова вечно в собственной заднице, Хротко? Очевидно же, что ее кто-то подставил!"

traits.locale_text: "Do you not find it funny that your head is always up your ass, Hrotko? It is obvious someone had framed her!"
"Do you not find it funny that your head is always up your ass, Hrotko? It is obvious someone had framed her!"
"And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It is obvious that someone framed her!"
"And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It is obvious that someone framed her!"
"And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"
"And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"
"And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"

languages.text: "Und findet Ihr es nicht witzig, dass Ihr nie über den Tellerrand hinausseht, Hrotko? Es ist offensichtlich, dass sie reingelegt wurde!"
languages.original_text: "And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"

traits.locale_text: "Und findet Ihr es nicht witzig, dass Ihr nie über den Tellerrand hinausseht, Hrotko? Es ist offensichtlich, dass sie reingelegt wurde!"

languages.text: « Et vous, Hrotko, vous ne trouvez pas ça drôle que vous ayez toujours la tête enfoncée aussi loin dans votre propre cul ? Allons, réfléchissez ! Quelqu'un lui fait porter le chapeau, c'est évident ! »
languages.original_text: "And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"

traits.locale_text: « Et vous, Hrotko, vous ne trouvez pas ça drôle que vous ayez toujours la tête enfoncée aussi loin dans votre propre cul ? Allons, réfléchissez ! Quelqu'un lui fait porter le chapeau, c'est évident ! »

languages.text: «¿Y a ti, no te resulta curioso tener siempre la cabeza metida en el culo, Hrotko? ¡Está claro que alguien pretende incriminarla!».
languages.original_text: "And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y a ti, no te resulta curioso tener siempre la cabeza metida en el culo, Hrotko? ¡Está claro que alguien pretende incriminarla!».

languages.text: 「なのに、おかしいとは思わないのか、フロトコ？自分の考えがいつも間違っていることを？明らかに誰かが彼女を陥れようとしているじゃないか！」
languages.original_text: "And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"

traits.locale_text: 「なのに、おかしいとは思わないのか、フロトコ？自分の考えがいつも間違っていることを？明らかに誰かが彼女を陥れようとしているじゃないか！」

languages.text: “你总是摆出这幅趾高气昂的样子，你自己就不觉得可笑吗，赫洛卡？很显然，是有人在陷害她！”
languages.original_text: "And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"

traits.locale_text: “你总是摆出这幅趾高气昂的样子，你自己就不觉得可笑吗，赫洛卡？很显然，是有人在陷害她！”

languages.text: "Kendinden başka kimseyi düşünmemeni de komik bulmuyor musun Hrotko? Birisinin suçu onun üzerine attığı aşikâr!"
languages.original_text: "And do you not find it funny that your head is always up your arse, Hrotko? It's obvious that someone framed her!"
